caption.p: Representative heat packs showing landing areas before and after Nepeta cataria treatments. Z stacks consisting of 60 images taken at 5 second intervals over 5 minutes showing the inside of a rearing cage and the heat source during experimentation with 20 female Aedes aegypti mosquitoes. A: Representative Z stack of control treatment. B: Representative Z stack of 1.00% N. cataria treatments.
